summary: Many different cartoon stars like Bugs Bunny, the Muppet Babies and Garfield join forces to convince a teenager that drugs aren't cool.
cast: Ross Bagdasarian Jr.|Jeff Bergman|Townsend Coleman|Wayne Collins|Jim Cummings|Joey Dedio|Danny Goldman|Georgi Irene|Janice Karman|Aaron Lohr|Jason Marsden|Don Messick|Lorenzo Music|Laurie O'Brien|Lindsay Parker|George C. Scott|Russi Taylor|Frank Welker|Barbara Bush|George Bush|Paul Fusco
keywords: drug|the muppets|toy comes to life|drug use|teenager
director: Directors: Milton Gray, Marsh Lamore | 3 more credits Â»
title: Cartoon All-Stars to the Rescue
